actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend title III of the Job Training Partnership Act to provide employment and training assistance for individuals who work full-time at a plant, facility, or enterprise that is a part of an economically-depressed industry and is located in an economically-depressed area.

summary.text: Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to provide for employment and training assistance for individuals who work full-time at a plant, facility, or enterprise that is a part of an economically-depressed industry and located in an economically-depressed area.

titles.title: To amend title III of the Job Training Partnership Act to provide employment and training assistance for individuals who work full-time at a plant, facility, or enterprise that is a part of an economically-depressed industry and is located in an economically-depressed area.
